pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation & Russ Barlow
pluginstrument.description:
********************* CIRRUS SF50 VISION JET LANDING GEAR ************************ ****************************************************************************************** Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION in collaboration with Russ Barlow for FlightFX VisionJet, updated for MS 2024 VisionJet by Vandalay1125 GitHub: https://simstrumentation.com
Landing Gear panel for the Vision Jet by MS/Asobo
Version info: - **v1.0** - 2025-1-2 - Updated for MS verrsion of SF50 in FS2024
NOTES: - Compatible with the MS SF50 Vision Jet. Compatibility with other aircraft possible but not guaranteed.
KNOWN ISSUES: - None
ATTRIBUTION: Based on code and graphics from Russ Barlow. Used with permission.
Sharing or re-use of any code or assets is not permitted without credit to the original authors.
